table.mysql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{TABLE.googlemaps}` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `address` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `address_type` int(11) NOT NULL, `c_date` int(11) NOT NULL, `c_user` int(11) NOT NULL, `active` tinyint(2) NOT NULL, `image` int(11) NOT NULL, `image_version` int(11) NOT NULL, `image_zoom` tinyint(2) NOT NULL, `icon` int(11) NOT NULL, `type` int(11) NOT NULL, `zoom` int(11) NOT NULL, `latitude` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `longitude` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{TABLE.googlemaps_lang}` ( `map_id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `lang` varchar(10) NOT NULL default '', `description` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `c` int(1) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`map_id`,`lang`) );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{TABLE.googlemaps_entries}` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `addr_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `address` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `description` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `active` int(2) NOT NULL, `image` int(11) NOT NULL, `image_version` int(11) NOT NULL, `position` int(11) NOT NULL, `planer` tinyint(2) NOT NULL, `map_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `latitude` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `longitude` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `icon` int(11) NOT NULL, `type` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{TABLE.googlemaps_entries_lang}` ( `entry_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `lang` varchar(10) NOT NULL default '', `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `description` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `c` int(1) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`entry_id`,`lang`) );
